SEARCH
Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.variation.diff

Class DiffGraph

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.variation.diff.DiffGraph
@Deprecated public final class DiffGraph extends Object
Deprecated.
Generalisation of DiffTrees to arbitrary change graphs with variability information. The DiffGraph class currently does not model a graph itself but rather turns a given graph into a DiffTree by equipping it with a synthetic root.

    fromNodes(Collection<DiffNode> nodes)
    Deprecated.

    static DiffTree
    fromNodes(Collection<DiffNode> nodes, DiffTreeSource source)
    Deprecated.
    Takes a set of DiffNodes that forms a DiffGraph (i.e., similar to a DiffTree but with no explicit root) and converts it to a DiffTree by equipping it with a synthetic root node.

    • fromNodes

      public static DiffTree fromNodes(Collection<DiffNode> nodes, DiffTreeSource source)
      Deprecated.
      Takes a set of DiffNodes that forms a DiffGraph (i.e., similar to a DiffTree but with no explicit root) and converts it to a DiffTree by equipping it with a synthetic root node.
      Parameters:
      nodes - a DiffGraph
      source - the source where the DiffGraph came from.
      Returns:
      A DiffTree representing the DiffGraph with a synthetic root node.
